meanings.definition: A group of insecticides derived from chrysanthemum flowers.
meanings.sent1: The allethrins effectively eliminated the pests in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use allethrins to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent3: The allethrins danced around the flowers, keeping the bugs away.
meanings.sent4: The allethrins acted like a shield, guarding the plants from insect attacks.
meanings.sent5: The allethrins were like tiny warriors fighting off the insect invaders.

meanings.definition: Chemical compounds used to control insects.
meanings.sent1: I sprayed allethrins in the kitchen to get rid of the ants.
meanings.sent2: The allethrins were effective in keeping mosquitoes away.
meanings.sent3: The allethrins threw a party and all the insects were invited!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the allethrins in eradicating pests.
meanings.sent5: The allethrins worked tirelessly, ensuring the insects stayed at bay.
